articles.content: I mean, I wasn't planning on getting the game anyways as I have yet to even play the first game, but even then......I traded my PS4 Slim in to replace my main "clean" Switch with the Mariko Switch fo… [+854 chars]

articles.author: Dion Dassanayake
articles.title: Samsung could be about to make its Galaxy S20 look massively over-priced - Express
articles.description: SAMSUNG looks to have a new Galaxy handset in the works which will be the perfect rival to budget handsets from Google, Huawei and OnePlus.
articles.content:
Either way, it looks like Samsung could have a new weapon to combat the threat of other rival, high-spec budget devices.
Last year Google shook up the Android marketplace with the brilliant Pixel 3A… [+673 chars]
